name: rename_robot
description:
Update or add a robot's name in Data/robot_names.json. If the robot ID already exists, its name is updated; otherwise, a new entry is created.

Output: A status message string confirming the update.

Example: `rename_robot(robot_id=2, robot_name='Bravo')`

robot_id.description: The ID of the robot to update or add.

robot_name.description: The new name to assign to the robot.

json_path.description: Optional path to the robot_names.json file (default: Data/robot_names.json).

name: get_robot_name
description:
Fetch the name of a robot given its ID from Data/robot_names.json.

Output: The robot name as a string if found, else `None`.

Example: `get_robot_name(robot_id=1)` → 'Alpha'

robot_id.description: The ID of the robot whose name should be retrieved.

json_path.description: Optional path to the robot_names.json file (default: Data/robot_names.json).

name: get_robot_id
description:
Fetch the ID of a robot given its name from Data/robot_names.json.

Output: The robot ID as an integer if found, else `None`.

Example: `get_robot_id(robot_name='Alpha')` → 1

robot_name.description: The name of the robot to look up.

json_path.description: Optional path to the robot_names.json file (default: Data/robot_names.json).
